TEXT.English: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories, Coal Plants, Hydro Plants, Electrical Grids and Automated Factories
TEXT.French: Les spécialistes rapportent de la production additionnelle, les ateliers et les moulins à eau rapportent de la nourriture additionnelle, et les moulins à eau et les mines rapportent du commerce additionnel ; vitesse de production doublée pour les usines, les centrales au charbon, les centrales hydroélectriques, les réseaux électriques et les usines automatisées
TEXT.German: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories, Coal Plants, Hydro Plants, Electrical Grids and Automated Factories
TEXT.Italian: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories, Coal Plants, Hydro Plants, Electrical Grids and Automated Factories
TEXT.Spanish: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories, Coal Plants, Hydro Plants, Electrical Grids and Automated Factories

TEXT.French: La doctrine religieuse la plus primitive
La doctrine territoriale la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves
TEXT.French: Expérience additionnelle pour les unités aériennes ; les routes commerciales avec les civilisations liées par un pacte de défense rapportent davantage ; les routes commerciales rapportent de la production ; lassitude de guerre additionnelle ; impossible d'utiliser des esclaves
TEXT.German: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves
TEXT.Italian: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves
TEXT.Spanish: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves

TEXT.English: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.French: Le mécontentement lié aux sociétés commerciales est réduit ; le bonheur en excès rapporte du commerce ; les moulins à vent, les réserves naturelles et les aires marines protégées rapportent du commerce ; vous pouvez dépenser de l'or pour accélérer la construction de bâtiments
TEXT.German: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.Italian: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.Spanish: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production

TEXT.English: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Observatories, Laboratories and Supercomputers; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.French: Pas de religion d'État ; science additionnelle dans toutes les villes ; bonheur additionnel pour toutes les religions ; vitesse de production doublée pour les hôpitaux, les universités, les observatoires, les laboratoires et les superordinateurs ; vous pouvez construire les merveilles qui nécessitent une religion d'État
TEXT.German: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Observatories, Laboratories and Supercomputers; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.Italian: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Observatories, Laboratories and Supercomputers; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.Spanish: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Observatories, Laboratories and Supercomputers; can build wonders that require a state religion

TEXT.English: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez capturer des ouvriers ; les carrières rapportent de la production additionnelle, et les mines et les plantations rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.Italian: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.Spanish: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations

TEXT.English: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus de prêtres ; les unités construites dans les villes avec la religion d'État reçoivent de l'expérience additionnelle ; les autres religions ne se propagent pas
TEXT.German: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.Italian: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.Spanish: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population; no unrest on city conquest
TEXT.French: Production plus rapide d'unités militaires ; pas de lassitude de guerre ; la population mécontente rapporte de la production ; pas de résistance lors de la conquête d'une ville
TEXT.German: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population; no unrest on city conquest
TEXT.Italian: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population; no unrest on city conquest
TEXT.Spanish: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population; no unrest on city conquest

TEXT.French: La doctrine sociale la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Additional units without upkeep; extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from Farms
TEXT.French: Le nombre d'unités ne nécessitant pas d'entretien est accru ; bonheur additionnel dans les villes les plus grandes ; les fermes rapportent de la production additionnelle
TEXT.German: Additional units without upkeep; extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from Farms
TEXT.Italian: Additional units without upkeep; extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from Farms
TEXT.Spanish: Additional units without upkeep; extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from Farms

TEXT.French: La doctrine gouvernementale la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Extra happiness from military units; double production speed for Jails, Constabularies
TEXT.French: Extra happiness from military units; double production speed for Jails, Constabularies
TEXT.German: Extra happiness from military units; double production speed for Jails, Constabularies
TEXT.Italian: Extra happiness from military units; double production speed for Jails, Constabularies
TEXT.Spanish: Extra happiness from military units; double production speed for Jails, Constabularies

TEXT.French: La doctrine de légitimité la plus primitive
Taux de natalité des personnages illustres augmenté
La doctrine sociale la plus primitive
La doctrine économique la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.French: Une route commerciale supplémentaire dans chaque ville ; les oasis créent du bonheur
TEXT.German: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.Italian: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.Spanish: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis

TEXT.English: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus de marchands ; les routes commerciales et les sociétés commerciales rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.Italian: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.Spanish: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases stability gained or lost by economic growth or recession by 33%
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Increases stability gained or lost by economic growth or recession by 33%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Increases stability gained or lost by economic growth or recession by 33%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increases stability gained or lost by economic growth or recession by 33%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Increases stability gained or lost by economic growth or recession by 33%

TEXT.English: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.French: Les religions non officielles créent du bonheur ; culture augmentée dans la capitale ; vous pouvez produire des missionnaires sans monastère
TEXT.German: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.Italian: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.Spanish: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries

TEXT.English: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.French: Les unités terrestres reçoivent de l'expérience additionnelle ; taux de croissance réduit pour les cottages, hameaux et villages ; vous recevez plus d'or au moment de conquérir des villes
TEXT.German: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.Italian: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.Spanish: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.French: Commerce additionnel dans la capitale pour chaque ville vassale ; les unités militaires sont produites avec de la nourriture ; les routes commerciales rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.Italian: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.Spanish: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes; increased espionage in capital
TEXT.French: Un spécialiste gratuit dans chaque ville ; pas de routes commerciales étrangères ; production de points d'espionnage accrue dans la capitale
TEXT.German: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes; increased espionage in capital
TEXT.Italian: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes; increased espionage in capital
TEXT.Spanish: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes; increased espionage in capital

TEXT.English: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez conscrire des unités ; les villes rapportent de la production additionnelle
TEXT.German: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.Italian: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.Spanish: Can draft units; extra production from Towns

TEXT.English: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez accélérer la production en sacrifiant de la population
TEXT.German: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population
TEXT.Italian: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population
TEXT.Spanish: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population

TEXT.English: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.French: Vitesse de construction des améliorations augmentée ; les plantations rapportent de la nourriture supplémentaire
TEXT.German: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.Italian: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.Spanish: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can build wonders regardless of State [ICON_RELIGION] requirements
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can build wonders regardless of State [ICON_RELIGION] requirements
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Can build wonders regardless of State [ICON_RELIGION] requirements
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can build wonders regardless of State [ICON_RELIGION] requirements
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can build wonders regardless of State [ICON_RELIGION] requirements

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No stability or instability from Civic combinations
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No stability or instability from Civic combinations
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]No stability or instability from Civic combinations
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]No stability or instability from Civic combinations
